The Tomb of Ysgramor
Set off on a journey to the Tomb of Ysgramor himself
You gather your men, and begin your journey.
The Tomb of Ysgramor
Set off on a journey to the Tomb of Ysgramor himself
You gather your men, and begin your journey.
Reform the Atmoran Bands
Warbands wander the wastelands of Atmora, it is time to reorganise them and revive the Atmoran tradition of Sellswords
Claim Wuuthrad
Attempt to wrest the legendary axe Wuuthrad from myth and memory.
Costs 1000 Gold and 1000 Prestige. 60% chance to obtain Wuuthrad.
Requires the Jylkurfyk wonder to be active in your realm.
You recently funded a search for Wuuthrad. Try again once the expedition concludes.
Wuuthrad Claimed
Your search bears fruit. In a hidden vault beneath Jylkurfyk, you uncover Wuuthrad itself. The axe hums with ancient power as your fingers close around its haft.
The axe is mine.
Empty Shadows
You scour every lead, but the vaults are barren and the guides' tales contradict one another. For now, Wuuthrad remains a legend out of reach.
Another time, perhaps.
Recently Searched for Wuuthrad
[Root.GetFirstName] has recently attempted to seek Wuuthrad. Their failure weighs heavily, and they must wait before trying again.
